metadata.title: CVE-2019-11627 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: gpg-key2ps in signing-party 1.1.x and 2.x before 2.10-1 contains an unsafe shell call enabling shell injection via a User ID.

criterions.comment: signing-party package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10-2').
